effects: Physical damage (1x, ATK) to all enemies, after one turn of delay
Physical damage (5.5x, ATK) with jump delay (1 turn)
name: Drop-down Attack

desc_short.0: Leap into the air, attack one enemy next turn, and damage all enemies
desc_short.5: Salta y ataca en el próximo turno, y daña a todos los enemigos
